languages.text: "Как исцелить чужую душу, Домин? Внутри разума ее идет битва, в которой она одна и проигрывает... Почти проиграла. Не вступить нам в ее разум, не подать ей руки... Хотя..."

traits.locale_text: "Как исцелить чужую душу, Эним? Внутри разума ее идет битва, в которой она одна и проигрывает... Почти проиграла. Не вступить нам в ее разум, не подать ей руки... Хотя..."

languages.text: "How would one heal the soul of another, Domin? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."
languages.original_text: "Как исцелить чужую душу, Домин? Внутри разума ее идет битва, в которой она одна и проигрывает... Почти проиграла. Не вступить нам в ее разум, не подать ей руки... Хотя..."

traits.locale_text: "How is one to heal the soul of another, Enim? A battle is being fought inside her mind, which she is losing... Nay, which she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."

"How is one to heal the soul of another, Enim? A battle is being fought inside her mind, which she is losing... Nay, which she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."
"How would one heal the soul of another, Enim? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."

"How would one heal the soul of another, Domin? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."

"How would one heal the soul of another, Domin? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."

languages.text: « Comment guérir l'âme d'un autre, Domin ? Elle mène un combat perdu d'avance dans son propre esprit... Nous ne pouvons y pénétrer. Nous ne pouvons lui tendre la main... Cela dit... »
languages.original_text: "How would one heal the soul of another, Domin? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."

traits.locale_text: « Comment guérir l'âme d'un autre, Domin ? Elle mène un combat perdu d'avance dans son propre esprit... Nous ne pouvons y pénétrer. Nous ne pouvons lui tendre la main... Cela dit... »

languages.text: «¿Cómo curaría un alma ajena, Domin? Está librando una batalla perdida en su mente... y la derrota es casi total. No podemos entrar en su mente. No podemos tenderle una mano... Aunque...».
languages.original_text: "How would one heal the soul of another, Domin? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo curaría un alma ajena, Domin? Está librando una batalla perdida en su mente... y la derrota es casi total. No podemos entrar en su mente. No podemos tenderle una mano... Aunque...».

languages.text: 「どうやって他人の魂を癒すというのですか、ドミン？彼女は心の中で勝てない戦いをしている…もう負けたも同然です。彼女の心に入ることはできません。手を差し伸べることはできません…ですが…」
languages.original_text: "How would one heal the soul of another, Domin? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."

traits.locale_text: 「どうやって他人の魂を癒すというのですか、ドミン？彼女は心の中で勝てない戦いをしている…もう負けたも同然です。彼女の心に入ることはできません。手を差し伸べることはできません…ですが…」

languages.text: “一个人该如何治愈另一个人的灵魂，秘者？她的心里正在发生冲突……她的正念已经落了下风，这场战斗她必败无疑。我们无法进入她的思想，也无法向她伸出援手……不过……”
languages.original_text: "How would one heal the soul of another, Domin? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."

traits.locale_text: “一个人该如何治愈另一个人的灵魂，秘者？她的心里正在发生冲突……她的正念已经落了下风，这场战斗她必败无疑。我们无法进入她的思想，也无法向她伸出援手……不过……”

languages.text: "Wie sollte man die Seele eines anderen heilen, Domin? Sie führt einen aussichtslosen Kampf in ihrem Geist ... Und sie hat ihn fast schon verloren. Wir können ihren Geist nicht betreten. Wir können ihr keine Hand reichen ... Obwohl ..."
languages.original_text: "How would one heal the soul of another, Domin? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."

traits.locale_text: "Wie sollte man die Seele eines anderen heilen, Domin? Sie führt einen aussichtslosen Kampf in ihrem Geist ... Und sie hat ihn fast schon verloren. Wir können ihren Geist nicht betreten. Wir können ihr keine Hand reichen ... Obwohl ..."

languages.text: "Başka birinin ruhunu nasıl iyileştirebiliriz Domin? Zihninde beyhude bir savaş veriyor. Neredeyse kaybettiği bir savaş... Zihnine giremiyoruz, ona yardım eli uzatamıyoruz... Gerçi..."
languages.original_text: "How would one heal the soul of another, Domin? She is fighting a losing battle inside her mind... One she has all but lost. We cannot enter her mind. We cannot reach out a hand to her... Although..."
